entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Haliburton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 07:09 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.8°C

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending early this afternoon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 5 cm. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 early this afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 10. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023
